basics.name: Super Nova
basics.label: Astronaut ðŸš€
basics.summary: A highly experienced astronaut currently on an exploratory mission to Mars, leading cutting-edge research on interplanetary science and human spaceflight. Recipient of numerous prestigious awards for contributions to space exploration.

work.name: Spacewalk Operations
work.summary: Oversaw multiple extravehicular activities (EVAs) to repair and upgrade critical ISS systems.
highlights: Performed 10 successful spacewalks totaling over 100 hours in microgravity.
Developed protocols for enhanced safety during complex EVAs.
Collaborated with engineers to install new solar arrays for ISS power generation.

work.name: Lunar Gateway Construction
work.summary: Supervised the assembly of the Gateway station in lunar orbit, enabling future deep-space missions.
highlights: Led the construction of the first habitable space station in lunar orbit.
Trained international teams in assembly techniques under low-gravity conditions.
Assisted in the first crewed docking with the Lunar Gateway.

work.name: Mars Rover Operations
work.summary: Piloted and maintained Mars exploration rovers, collecting data on Martian terrain and climate.
highlights: Managed over 1,000 kilometers of rover navigation on the Martian surface.
Collected critical geological samples for return to Earth analysis.
Assisted in the discovery of water-ice beneath the Martian surface.

work.name: Deep Space Research
work.summary: Led research into the effects of deep-space radiation on human physiology and spacecraft systems.
highlights: Published findings on radiation shielding effectiveness in peer-reviewed journals.
Conducted biological experiments on the impact of space radiation on human DNA.
Developed new safety protocols for long-duration spaceflight.

work.name: Interplanetary Communications Network
work.summary: Engineered reliable communication systems between Earth and interplanetary spacecraft.
highlights: Improved communication latency for deep-space missions by 20%.
Designed and tested new protocols for faster data transmission from Mars.
Coordinated real-time mission updates from Mars to Earth.

volunteer.summary: Advocated for space exploration and educated the public about the Mars mission through school visits, media interviews, and public lectures.
highlights: Reached over 500,000 students globally through live streaming from Mars.
Collaborated with educators to develop space science curriculums for schools.
Engaged with international audiences to inspire interest in space exploration.

awards.title: Medal of Space Exploration
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding leadership during the Mars mission and contribution to interplanetary science.

awards.title: Astronaut Achievement Award
awards.summary: Recognized for exemplary performance in spacewalks and Martian habitat construction.

publications.name: Exploring Mars: A New Frontier in Space Exploration
